entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, mentioned as 'H ARRY  POTTER' in the first line. He is described as panting and suggesting that the monster was standing on the floor.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a character who is part of Harry's group. He is mentioned as saying 'What do they think they're doing, keeping a thing like that locked up in a school?'

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a character who is part of Harry's group. She is described as getting her breath and bad temper back again.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a character who is part of Harry's group. He is mentioned as looking like he'd never speak again.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a portrait on the seventh floor that guards the common room. She is described as asking 'Where on earth have you all been?'

entities.name: pig snout
entities.description: Pig Snout is the monster that Harry and his friends encountered. It is described as needing exercise.

relationships.description: Harry interacted with the Fat Lady when he and his friends entered the common room.
Ron commented on the Pig Snout, saying 'If any dog needs exercise, that one does.'
Hermione also commented on the Pig Snout, saying 'You don't use your eyes, any of you, do you?' and 'Didn't you see what it was standing on?
Harry also commented on the Pig Snout, suggesting that it was standing on the floor.
